publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2120.1 Murdo Fraser: Education Cuts—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2120) in the name of Rhona Brankin, insert at end "but condemns the decision of the Educational Institute for Scotland at its recent conference to ballot its members on industrial action, and believes that any strike action by teachers will be immensely damaging to educational provision in Scotland and to Scotland’s school pupils."
